image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Illinois; born in Pensacola, Escambia County, Fla., September 22, 1949; attended University of Illinois, Springfield, Ill.; B.A., Southern Illinois University, Edwardsville, Ill., 1974; J.D., Southern Illinois University, Edwardsville, Ill., 1979; M.S.S., United States Army War College, Carlisle, Pa., 2000; United States Air Force, 1969-1973; United States Air Force Reserve, 1973-1975; attorney; businessman; Illinois Army National Guard, 1982-2012; adjutant general, Illinois Army National Guard, 2007-2012; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress (January 3, 2013-January 3, 2015); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress in 2014.

asset.name: E000292_001
